en.title: What's Your SNS Type? (MBTI Ver.2)
en.description: What style would you be if you were a SNS account? From feed styling to comment reactions and like patterns! Find your MBTI type in SNS.

questions.question: 1. What kind of posts are most common on your feed?
options: Landscape or small daily life photos

questions.question: 2. When a friend posts an emotional post, you:
options: Are you okay? Send DM immediately
First understand the situation and act carefully

questions.question: 3. When posting content on SNS, you:
options: Post freely whenever you feel like it

questions.question: 4. Your criteria for likes/comments?
options: React immediately if fun or touching
Only react to people I know

questions.question: 5. What do you care about most on SNS?
6. When you get a DM notification, you:
7. The phrase that best describes me on SNS is:
8. The situation you hate most on SNS is:
9. Your criteria for adding friends on SNS:
options: People who communicate well with each other

questions.question: 10. Your feedback style on SNS is:
12. My DM/comment frequency on SNS:
options: Often, actively communicate with many people

results.title: ğŸŒ™ Emotional Recorder INFP
results.desc:
A dreamy emotional SNS user who quietly records emotions and thoughts!

You tend to cultivate your feed alone and express your inner self through long posts.
results.subDesc: You tend to cultivate your feed alone and express your inner self through long posts.

results.title: ğŸ”¥ Meme Master ENTP
results.desc:
A SNS pioneer who shakes the world with stories and memes!

You comment on comments and are a meme creator who always creates topics.
results.subDesc: You comment on comments and are a meme creator who always creates topics.

results.title: ğŸ‰ Energy Burst ENFP
results.desc:
SNS insider who fills the feed with bright and positive energy!

You actively participate in various challenges and events.
results.subDesc: You actively participate in various challenges and events.

results.title: ğŸ¦„ Inspiration Collector INFJ
results.desc:
A quiet creator who captures deep insights and inspiration on SNS!

You prefer emotional yet meaningful content.
results.subDesc: You prefer emotional yet meaningful content.

results.title: ğŸ§  Strategist INTJ
results.desc:
SNS master who designs feeds with analysis and strategy!

You enjoy planned and systematic SNS management.
results.subDesc: You enjoy planned and systematic SNS management.

results.title: ğŸ‘‘ SNS Leader ENTJ
results.desc:
The one with great drive who demonstrates leadership even on SNS!

You lead issues and guide followers.
results.subDesc: You lead issues and guide followers.

results.title: ğŸ€ Warm Recorder ISFJ
results.desc:
Healing SNS user who records small daily life and warm moments!

You value memories with friends, family, and precious people.
results.subDesc: You value memories with friends, family, and precious people.

results.title: ğŸ’¬ Communication King ESFJ
results.desc:
SNS communicator who enjoys communication through comments, DMs, and likes!

You value relationships with followers and leave active feedback.
results.subDesc: You value relationships with followers and leave active feedback.

results.title: ğŸ“š Standard User ISTJ
results.desc:
SNS standard user who manages feed honestly and carefully!

You prefer regular and consistent content.
results.subDesc: You prefer regular and consistent content.

results.title: ğŸ—‚ï¸ Operator ESTJ
results.desc:
Operator type who systematically manages SNS!

You emphasize planning, execution, and efficiency.
results.subDesc: You emphasize planning, execution, and efficiency.

results.title: ğŸŒ¸ Emotional Artist ISFP
results.desc:
Artist type who decorates sensual and free feeds!

You enjoy various emotional content like photos, music, and videos.
results.subDesc: You enjoy various emotional content like photos, music, and videos.

results.title: ğŸˆ Feed Mood Maker ESFP
results.desc:
SNS entertainer who fills the feed with bright and cheerful atmosphere!

You actively participate in events, memes, and challenges.
results.subDesc: You actively participate in events, memes, and challenges.

results.title: ğŸ”§ Experimenter ISTP
results.desc:
SNS explorer who experiments with new features and various formats!

You're interested in technology, tools, and trends.
results.subDesc: You're interested in technology, tools, and trends.

results.title: ğŸš€ Action User ESTP
results.desc:
Spontaneous and energetic SNS action user!

You enjoy new attempts and challenges.
results.subDesc: You enjoy new attempts and challenges.

results.title: ğŸ§© Analyst INTP
results.desc:
Intellectual type who explores SNS with curiosity and analytical skills!

You enjoy digging into the principles of information, memes, and trends.
